column4: Hi guy, I want to know the way of removing apache2 that was installed from source code, I mean, I dont used apt-get install, compiled and installed in /usr/local/
Hi Dr_Willis, I am new to linux ubutu, what you mean "from the source dir"
I uncompress the source code in "Desktop" and I made "./configure", "make" and "make install"
you do know Apache is available in Ubuntu repos, right?
